it felt like the audio was turned up so high that when characters were talking laud it was like static noise  one of the worst audio i have ever heard/seen on any release cam or r5
Oh, i hate R5's with cam audio. Wtf is the point?
Thanks for the upload scene4all. Appreciate the effort FUCKERS

Thanks for uploading scene4all, much appreciated.

For those who gave audio 8 & 10 u need to watch past the first 30 seconds. It starts off really good but after approx 30 seconds the audio is cam quality (as it states in the description). I found it hard to hear in parts due to it being very pitchy. It also goes out of sync a few times throughout the movie and so will need to be adjusted. 

The video on the other hand is excellent quality.

All in all i would say V/9 & A/5, worth downloading if you can't wait.

Cheers again scene4all.

Good upload scene4all!

A 3
I enjoy the video quality, albeit a little fuzzy at times, although, the audio does need a bit of work.
Good upload overall, and thanks for the effort!
